name: GeekTek
overview:
GeekTek is a Los Angeles-based IT services provider specializing in custom IT solutions. Founded by Eric Schlissel, GeekTek works primarily with small- and mid-sized businesses in fields from advertising to manufacturing in Culver City, Beverly Hills, Santa Monica, West Hollywood, and the surrounding area. Schlissel has partnered with companies like Microsoft, Google, and Inuit to provide support for a number of different programs.

Offering a wide range of functional IT solutions, GeekTek provides free initial IT service evaluations and individualizes its services to fit the needs of its clients. Focusing on streamlining companies’ existing IT services, GeekTek’s “Bad IT Service Rescue” assesses a company’s current situation and suggests manageable improvements. GeekTek is also a Managed Service Provider, featuring both on-site and off-site technical support.

In addition to its traditional IT offerings, GeekTek offers website design and development services, SaaS and VOIP cloud services, and assistance with search engine optimization (SEO) and search engine marketing (SEM) strategies.
